experimental conditions, and catalyst form (film and powder); however, these values work as a reference for the CH 4 yield.The average CH 4 production rate of 14.0 mol g cat h -1 obtained in this study for the am-TNTA film can be considered an impressive CH 4 production rate for a pure TiO 2 with no modification, no doping, no other materials added, and no heat treatment.As a reference, it can be seen that the pure anatase TiO 2 powder (commercial Degussa P25) as photocatalyst for CO 2 conversion to
